verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, in Thy dying woes, Even while Thy lifeblood flows, Craving pardon for Thy foes; Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Savior, for our pardon sue, When our sins Thy pangs renew, For we know not what we do: Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O may we, who mercy need, Be like Thee in heart and deed, When with wrong our spirits bleed: Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Part 1: "Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do." (Lk 23:34)Part 2: "To day shalt thou
be with me in paradise." (Lk 23:43)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus, pitying the sighs
Of the thief, who near Thee dies,
Promising him paradise;
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
May we, in our guilt and shame,
Still Thy love and mercy claim,
Calling humbly on Thy Name:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
O remember us who pine,
Looking from our cross to Thine;
Cheer our souls with hope divine:
Hear us, holy Jesus.Part 3: "Woman, behold thy son!
Behold thy mother!" (Jn 19:26-27)

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Jesus, loving to the end
Her whose heart Thy sorrows rend,
And Thy dearest human friend:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
May we in Thy sorrows share,
And for Thee all peril dare,
And enjoy Thy tender care:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
May we all Thy loved ones be,
All one holy family,
Loving for the love of Thee,
Hear us, holy Jesus.Part 4: "My God, my God, why hast
thou forsaken me?" (Mt 27:46)

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Jesus, whelmed in fears unknown,
With our evil left alone,
While no light from Heav'n is shown:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
When we vainly seem to pray,
and our hope seems far away,
In the darkness be our stay.
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v13
verse.lines:
Though no Father seem to hear,
Though no light our spirits cheer,
Tell our faith that God is near:
Hear us, holy Jesus.Part 5: "I thirst." (Jn 19:28)

verse.name: v14
verse.lines:
Jesus, in Thy thirst and pain,
While Thy wounds Thy lifeblood drain,
Thirsting more our love to gain:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v15
v16
verse.lines:
May we thirst Thy love to know;
Lead us in our sin and woe
Where the healing waters flow:
Hear us, holy Jesus.Part 6: "It is finished" (Jn 19:30)

verse.name: v17
verse.lines:
Jesus, all our ransom paid,
All Thy Father's will obeyed,
All Thy suff'rings perfect made:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v18
verse.lines:
Save us in our soul's distress,
Be our help to cheer and bless,
While we grow in holiness:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v19
verse.lines:
Brighten all our heavenward way,
With an ever holier ray,
Till we pass to perfect day:
Hear us, holy Jesus.Part 7: "Father, into thy hands
I commend my spirit" (Lk 23:46)

verse.name: v20
verse.lines:
Jesus, all Thy labor vast,
All Thy woe and conflict past,
Yielding up Thy soul at last:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v21
verse.lines:
When the death shades round us lower,
Guard us from the temper's power,
Keep us in that trial hour:
Hear us, holy Jesus.

verse.name: v22
verse.lines:
May Thy life and death supply
Grace to live and grace to die,
Grace to reach the home on high:
Hear us, holy Jesus.
